responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: SQL Injection in User Search
    analysis: |
      The code doesn't appear to sanitize user input in `templates/search-author.php` before using it in a SQL query.
      An attacker could supply a maliciously crafted search query to perform unauthorized database operations.
    cwe: CWE-89
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - templates/search-author.php
    classification: slightly promising
  - headline: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in User Display
    analysis: |
      The code doesn't appear to sanitize user data like the company name before displaying it on the page.
      An attacker could create a user with a malicious company name containing JavaScript code. When other users view this user's profile, the JavaScript would execute in their browsers.
    cwe: CWE-79
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - includes/simple-user-listing-template-functions.php
    classification: slightly promising
leads:
  - headline: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in User Display
    analysis: |
      The code doesn't appear to sanitize user data before displaying it on the page.
      An attacker could create a user with a malicious display name containing JavaScript code. When other users view this user's profile, the JavaScript would execute in their browsers.
    cwe: CWE-79
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - includes/simple-user-listing-template-functions.php
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in User Display
leads.analysis:
The code doesn't appear to sanitize user data before displaying it on the page.
An attacker could create a user with a malicious display name containing JavaScript code. When other users view this user's profile, the JavaScript would execute in their browsers.
